name: liquidjs

scripts.browserify: browserify index.js -s Liquid --ignore path -t [ babelify --global true --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/liquid.js
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report html ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive
scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.lcov: cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report lcovonly ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive
scripts.version: npm run dist && git add -A dist
